segments.text: I see the woman’s foot already in the puddle, yet she shows no sign of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange how someone can be so engrossed in a task while the world falls apart around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is gushing out, and the risk of slipping seems imminent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she’s still polishing that plate; it’s as if time has frozen for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, on the other hand, are the picture of excitement and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching into that cookie jar with such determination; it’s a sight to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But every time he stretches, I feel a knot form in my stomach, worried he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her hand raised, hopeful and eager for a cookie, which is endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s hilarious and terrifying at the same time, this secret cookie heist happening right under the woman’s nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just turn around and see what's happening, save them from their own thrill-seeking.
segments.speaker: PAR
